mapper.select: SELECT cm.id, cm.star, cm.content, cm.create_at as createAt, cm.update_at as updateAt, cm.user_id as userId, cm.pitch_id as pitchId, u.fullname, u.avatar FROM comment cm join user u where cm.pitch_id = #{pitch_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment ( star, content, user_id, pitch_id) VALUES (#{star}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{pitchId});
